text:
I already contacted HubSpot support, but my messages go directly to Sales and they are not able to fix it. The agent that answered me told me that they contacted internally to someone else, but I had no more information.

Today another 24h have passed but I’m still not able to renew it myself.
They even told me to try here in the slack :sweat:
Does anyone know how to create weebhook on HubSpot
for stripe as i need to add some custom functionlity
or do we have to implment it in automation or we can write a script

Hi Tom,
How are you? I'm experiencing the same problem.
Did you manage to find a solution?
You can create webhooks on an app, or you can trigger one in a workflow
So if you create a HubSpot app, it has options to set webhooks which fire on create/update events on specific properties

the other option if you have enterprise is to send a webhook in a workflow, and if you don't have enterprise, you can create a custom workflow action which triggers a webhook on an app and install the app to the account
thanks a lot <@U01DQL7AMFH>
you helped the most
and one thing , how we can hit api for stripe in hubpot
is this also be done with workflow
you can if you have an operations account
they have a code option in workflows
so you can trigger code and grab variables from other places within the workflow. there's a "secrets" option to store credentials

but if you don't have ops, you can run it with a bridge app of some sort

so:

• workflow triggers custom action
• custom action triggers webhook and sends to specified bridge app
• bridge app takes data from webhook and triggers api call
How to add a mega menu in HubSpot with CTA, Image etc.
Create it as a custom module

one last thing ....
what endpoint url we should add for event listner from stripe to HubSpot
what endpoint url we should add for event listner from stripe to HubSpot
You need to write your own middleman backend webhook script, and then catch events from Stripe. In that script you can push events to HubSpot via API.
We have a ready solution for this at <https://www.depositfix.com/>
I am hitting Create Customer on stripe with python script but it didn't able to get the stripe module at there
any support for me
If there is a free theme in the marketplace, then I’d also download it and study its code. Take note of what you like/dislike about it and make it better for your needs
Thank you Evelynn!
Sometimes this has happened to me with an unclosed / improperly closed html tag in a module or template
Hi someone knows who to get the contact and companies ids associated to a task with a search endpoint?
Hi anyone knows how can i integrate HubSpot with laravel and create custom objects
You'll have to use the associations endpoint to associate contacts and companies to tasks, <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/associations>, this can't be done through the search endpoint
with that endpoint i can also get the properties of the contact like name ?
No you can do that with the contacts or search endpoint
But you can only associate using the association endpoint

so you  i have to get the task associated to an owner then i have to make to other request one to see if there is a compnay associated with it and another one to get the contacts associated, after that i have to make to two other requests to get the properties of company and contact?

So you can get all the associated companies and contacts for a task using one search endpoint call (along with the task properties), then you can get the company properties using the companies api, then get the contact properties using the contacts api.
how do i get the company or contact id associated to a task in the search endpoint?
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/search>
Let me know if you have any questions
but that wont give me the id, that it is to filter the tasks
i filter the tasks by the owner id and i need that in the properties that are returned, i need to find the company or the contact id associated with the task
if you want you can book sometime with me and I can walk you through it over zoom, seems easier then slacking back and forth
yes please
i really need this endpoint to work correctly
It works correctly
Might not do everything you want it to do but it works correctly
you can book through the link in my bio
i was talking about my backend application because now it takes a lot of time to bring me all the data
Oh dear. Could you try this, maybe? Set up a private app for this portal with some kind of limited access (say, to contacts) and try sending an API call from postman -- just a random idea.
sorry to ask but which link ?
You're good man, <http://HubSpot.com/meetings/carter-mckay|HubSpot.com/meetings/carter-mckay>
Hi Gabriel! Good news, you should be back on the road now.
cool! thank you very much <@U04BWKTAVJ6>
I was going to try it out again!

No need to, you should be all set. As to why exactly this happened, I don't have any info on that. My best advice going forward would be to renew maybe a little earlier, or send an API call every once in a while to this portal. Sorry I don't have more of an explanation for you.

I need some help with robots.txt files

My CRM has a primary domain <http://www.example.com|www.example.com> and redirect domain <http://example.com|example.com> both of which has a separate robots.txt file. I want to find a way where i have only one version of robots.txt file but HS says it’s not possible on their end. Any ideas ?
I have also seen similar behavior occur when I have smart rules applied.

How can I create a workflow with triggering on any changes to the "*Lifecycle Stage*" property ?
Most of other properties can be triggered using "*is known*" for any changes... but I noticed some of the properties like "*Lifecycle Stage*", "*Contact Owner*", "*Lead Status*" etc... are cannot be triggered if any changes is happening to them.
